He was an inventor and a billionaire through his size, age, and gender manipulating products that brought on the TG/AR/AP revolution that changed the entire world.

The accident occurred in dad's lab. He was testing a new form of DNA manipulation. He had intended to test it on a cat but Ashely thought it cruel and jumped in the way. Being the protective brother, you pushed both Ashley and the cat out of harms way. However, you were hit instead. You shrank down to the size of a baby doll.

You later discovered that you could return to your normal size with some concentration. Dad gave you a which grows and shrinks with your body. However, you also learned that Ashley could change your gender with but a push of a button. She could make you a Barbie doll or a baby girl doll. The only saving grace was that dad assured you that you would return to your normal gender, a boy, upon returning to your normal size. When asked what you would do with this new gift, you smiled as replied, "I think I'll be Ashley's dolly bodyguard."

Ashley was thrilled to have you as her new dolly. She was even more thrilled to hear you would be her bodyguard as many people had tried to kidnap her for her fortune.

With a few modifications, mom made a second home for you in Ashley's bedroom. "Now, honey, your bother must have at least two days off per week to be himself." Firmly but kindly, she ordered. "He is your brother, not a doll or some hired help, understand?"

Ashley winced slightly. "Yes, mommy."

"I will take Saturdays and Sundays off." Politely, you offered. "That way, I can be there for her at school and her ballet classes."

"That's fine, dear." Smiling, mom said.

"Where will I be sleeping as her bodyguard?" Curious, you asked.

Mom gave you a mischievous grin. "You temporary home while being your sister's bodyguard is..."
